name: PlanetShooting - (game)
description:
You have to defeat the unidentified life form inhabiting the sun to prevent the temperature rise of the sun causing the galaxy global warming.
This vertical scroll shooting game draws that story dramatically.
Players can compete for a total point by destroying enemies by tipping a device, and accumulating score.

Play in your spare time and get high score!


【Operation Method】
1. Tilt your device
※The degree of the device when you started a game is the base degree. You can update the base degree when you tap the device.
2. Tap the device and move your finger


【Development secret story】
It was a long way until the solar system became the stage.

However I noticed that it is hard for me to write trees.

However I noticed the building dropping in not a thing to write.

And next, I was studded with stars in the background.
I noticed here.
